Permeable Pavement.Criteria: A 2’ separation must be established between the bottom layer of the permeable pavement and the seasonal high ground water table (SHGWT.)
Permeable Pavement.Comment: The system is showing that there is less than 2' in separation between the bottom of facility and the SHGWT. Revise the desing to provide the separation.

Permeable Pavement.Criteria: A 5’ setback must be provided between the facility and any building.
Permeable Pavement.Comment: The shown permeable pavement system is setback less than 5' from the adjacent building. Relocate the system away from the building to meet the required setback.

Stormwater - General Requirements.Criteria: A stormwater management narrative must be included for every stormwater management plan.
Stormwater - General Requirements.Comment: Provide a Stormwater Management Narrative with the following information, but not be limited to: Description of existing site conditions; Pre-development and post-development drainage conditions and patterns; Disturbed area; Proposed impervious area; Soil characteristics; Description of proposed development; Description of proposed stormwater management facilities; Special circumstances and assumptions; Summary of flow results and how the stormwater management design meets water quality and water quantity (channel and flood protection) requirements in accordance with the City Stormwater Management Ordinance

Stormwater - General Requirements.Criteria: Drainage area maps must be provided that correctly reflect the drainage characteristics of the predeveloped and post-developed conditions
Stormwater - General Requirements.Comment: Provide the predeveloped and post developed drainage area maps to the plans
